books.author: by William P. Young
books.description: A man whose daughter was abducted is invited to an isolated shack, apparently by God.
books.name: THE SHACK

books.author: by Patricia Briggs
books.description: The shape-shifter Mercy Thompson finds herself in the clutches of the world’s most powerful vampire.
books.name: SILENCE FALLEN

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: A television correspondent investigates damning allegations against the vice president of the United States.
books.name: DANGEROUS GAMES

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: Who will end up dead, and how, when three mothers with children in the same school become friends?
books.name: BIG LITTLE LIES

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A curmudgeon's gruff exterior masks a generosity of spirit. Originally published in Sweden in 2014.
books.name: A MAN CALLED OVE

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: A woman is haunted by her father’s crimes as she tries to pursue love and her work as a photographer.
books.name: THE OBSESSION

books.author: by Maya Banks
books.description: Zoe assumes a new persona, one who's falling for the reckless Joe.
books.name: BRIGHTER THAN THE SUN

books.author: by W. Bruce Cameron
books.description: A canine narrator undergoes a series of reincarnations.
books.name: A DOG'S PURPOSE

books.author: by Lisa Jackson
books.description: Alvarez and Pescoli are back, dodging a reality-TV crew while tracking a serial killer stalking the woods of a remote Montana town.
books.name: EXPECTING TO DIE

books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: Detective Alex Cross and his wife, Bree, team up to catch a killer causing chaos in Washington, D.C.
books.name: CROSS THE LINE

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: Poetic approaches to surviving adversity and loss.
books.name: MILK AND HONEY

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: In a sequel to “Memory Man,” Amos Decker, a detective with an extraordinary memory, investigates the case of a convicted killer who wins a last-minute reprieve.
books.name: THE LAST MILE

books.author: by Anne Bishop
books.description: The wolf-shifter leader Simon Wolfgard and the blood prophet Meg Corbyn must work with a human pack to maintain a fragile peace.
books.name: ETCHED IN BONE

books.author: by Allison Brennan
books.description: Lucy's nuptials are disrupted by the arrival of her fiancé's siblings, intently bent on trouble.
books.name: MAKE THEM PAY
